remarks: Value of the object part of the identity functor.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)
statement:
idfuval.i $e |- I = ( idFunc ` C ) $.
idfuval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
idfuval.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
idfu1.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
idfu1 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( 1st ` I ) ` X ) = X ) $.
